Package com.taheris.gameoflife

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutActivity
    Purpose: Display the About layout Description: Inflates the about view and sets the background
    BuildConfig  
    GameOfLife
    Purpose: Start a new Game of Life Description: Controls the state of the game
    GameOfLifeActivity
    Purpose: Starts the Game of Life view Description: Capture any touch gestures on the view to control game actions
    GameOfLifeCell
    Purpose: Representation of a Game of Life cell Description: Defines methods to identify whether cell is alive, or has previously lived
    GameOfLifeGrid
    Purpose: Reprsentation of a Game of Life grid Description: Responsive layout defined relative to the size of the screen
    GameOfLifeView
    Purpose: Controls the screen rendering Description: Canvas updates are done in a thread separate from the main GUI
    IntroActivity
    Purpose: Display the Intro layout Description: Shows a splash screen for the specified time then inflates Menu view
    LayoutActivity
    Purpose: Display the Layout view Description: Layout view allows the user to select from a pre-defined layout
    MenuActivity
    Purpose: Display the Menu view Description: Show the menu then attach event listeners to all buttons
    R  
    R.array  
    R.attr  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.string  
    R.style  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameOfLifeLayout
    Purpose: Defined Game of Life patterns Description: Let's the user choose from a random grid or previously set patterns
